targets.rawSql:
select 
	avg(tc.duration_minutes / (60 * 24.0)) as eta
from trello_cards tc 
inner join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
left join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id 
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
where tl.name like 'type:%' 
	and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
	and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})

select 
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
select 
	tc.trello_id,
	sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
from trello_cards tc 
inner join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
left join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id 
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
left join trello_card_history tch 
on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
where tl.name like 'type:%' 
	and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0b811bfc2a9b31cc852'
	and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
	and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
group by tc.trello_id
) as result

select 
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
select 
	tc.trello_id,
	sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
from trello_cards tc 
inner join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
left join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id 
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
left join trello_card_history tch 
on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
where tl.name like 'type:%' 
	and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0d2da16f4a190bcb5e3'
	and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
	and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
group by tc.trello_id
) as result

select 
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
select 
	tc.trello_id,
	sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
from trello_cards tc 
inner join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
left join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id 
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
left join trello_card_history tch 
on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
where tl.name like 'type:%' 
	and tch.trello_list_id = '64abb4da74aacfb1812e144a'
	and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
	and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
group by tc.trello_id
) as result

select
	bug_complexity as Complexity,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		case 
			when tc.score <= 3 then '1 easy'
			when tc.score = 5 then '2 middle'
			else '3 hard'
		end as bug_complexity,
		tc.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	where tl.name like 'type: bug%'
		and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
		and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
) as result
group by bug_complexity

select
	bug_complexity as Complexity,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		case 
			when tc.score <= 3 then '1 easy'
			when tc.score = 5 then '2 middle'
			else '3 hard'
		end as bug_complexity,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type: bug%'
		and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0b811bfc2a9b31cc852'
		and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
		and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tc.score
) as result
group by bug_complexity

select
	bug_complexity as Complexity,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		case 
			when tc.score <= 3 then '1 easy'
			when tc.score = 5 then '2 middle'
			else '3 hard'
		end as bug_complexity,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type: bug%'
		and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0d2da16f4a190bcb5e3'
		and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
		and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tc.score
) as result
group by bug_complexity

select
	bug_complexity as Complexity,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		case 
			when tc.score <= 3 then '1 easy'
			when tc.score = 5 then '2 middle'
			else '3 hard'
		end as bug_complexity,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type: bug%'
		and tch.trello_list_id = '64abb4da74aacfb1812e144a'
		and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
		and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tc.score
) as result
group by bug_complexity

panels.title: üëè Bug average time in ready to merge

targets.rawSql:
select
	type as Type,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		tl.name as type,
		tc.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	where tl.name like 'type:%' 
    and tl.name not like '%bug%'
		and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
		and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
) as result
group by type

select
	type as Type,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		tl.name as type,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type:%' 
    	and tl.name not like '%bug%'
    	and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0b811bfc2a9b31cc852'
			and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
			and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tl.name
) as result
group by type

select
	type as Type,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		tl.name as type,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type:%' 
    	and tl.name not like '%bug%'
    	and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0d2da16f4a190bcb5e3'
			and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
			and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tl.name
) as result
group by type

select
	type as Type,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		tl.name as type,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type:%' 
    	and tl.name not like '%bug%'
    	and tch.trello_list_id = '64abb4da74aacfb1812e144a'
			and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
			and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tl.name
) as result
group by type

panels.title: üëè Other cards time in ready to merge

targets.rawSql:
select 
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
select 
	tc.trello_id,
	sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
from trello_cards tc 
inner join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
left join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id 
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
left join trello_card_history tch 
on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
where tl.name like 'type:%' 
	and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0caee2889ee4735dfd4'
	and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
	and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
group by tc.trello_id
) as result

select 
	tl.name as Type,
	DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time)) as Week,
	avg(tc.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as Eta
from trello_cards tc 
left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
left join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id 
where tl.name like 'type%'
group by tl.name, DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time))

select
	bug_complexity as Complexity,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		case 
			when tc.score <= 3 then '1 easy'
			when tc.score = 5 then '2 middle'
			else '3 hard'
		end as bug_complexity,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type: bug%'
		and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0caee2889ee4735dfd4'
		and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
		and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tc.score
) as result
group by bug_complexity

select
	type as Type,
	avg(eta) as ETA
from (
	select
		tc.trello_id as card_id,
		tl.name as type,
		sum(tch.duration_minutes / (24.0 * 60)) as eta
	from trello_cards tc 
	left join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
	on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_labels tl 
	on tl.trello_id  = tclr.trello_label_id 
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
	on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
	left join trello_card_history tch 
	on tch.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id
	where tl.name like 'type:%' 
    	and tl.name not like '%bug%'
    	and tch.trello_list_id = '5a2fc0caee2889ee4735dfd4'
			and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
			and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
	group by tc.trello_id, tl.name
) as result
group by type

select 
	COUNT(tc.trello_id) as bug_count,
	DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time)) as week 
from trello_cards tc 
inner join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
inner join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id 
where tl.name like '%bug%'
group by DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time))
having DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time)) between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'

select 
  tl.name,
	ISNULL(SUM(score * 1.0 / mc.member_count), 0) as story_points
from trello_cards tc 
inner join trello_card_label_relation tclr 
on tclr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id  
inner join trello_labels tl 
on tl.trello_id = tclr.trello_label_id
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr 
on tcmr.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
inner join (
		select 
			tc2.trello_id as card_id,
			count(tcmr2.trello_member_id) as member_count
		from trello_cards tc2 
		left join trello_card_member_relation tcmr2 
		on tcmr2.trello_card_id = tc2.trello_id
		where tc2.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
		group by tc2.trello_id
) as mc
on mc.card_id = tc.trello_id
where tl.name like 'type:%'
	and tc.done_time between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
	and tcmr.trello_member_id in (${employee_id})
group by tl.name

select 
	tm.full_name as assignee,
	DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time)) as week,
	ISNULL(SUM(ts.score), 0) as points
from trello_cards tc 
inner join (
	select
		trello_id,
		(score * 1.) / COUNT(tcmr_inner.id) as score
	from trello_cards tc_inner
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr_inner
	on tcmr_inner.trello_card_id = tc_inner.trello_id 
	group by trello_id, score
) ts
on tc.trello_id = ts.trello_id
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr2
on tcmr2.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
inner join trello_members tm 
on tm.trello_id = tcmr2.trello_member_id 
group by tm.full_name, DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time))
having DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time)) between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'

select 
	tm.full_name as assignee,
	DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time)) as week,
	ISNULL(SUM(ts.score), 0) as points
from trello_cards tc 
inner join (
	select
		trello_id,
		(score * 1.) / COUNT(tcmr_inner.id) as score
	from trello_cards tc_inner
	inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr_inner
	on tcmr_inner.trello_card_id = tc_inner.trello_id 
	group by trello_id, score
) ts
on tc.trello_id = ts.trello_id
inner join trello_card_member_relation tcmr2
on tcmr2.trello_card_id = tc.trello_id 
inner join trello_members tm 
on tm.trello_id = tcmr2.trello_member_id 
group by tm.full_name, DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time))
having DATETRUNC(week, DATEADD(week, 1, tc.done_time)) between '${__from:date:iso}' and '${__to:date:iso}'
